attributes.action: apologise unreservedly for claiming that NHS expense claims need reform when there is no evidence of significant misrepresentation or to link them to the disgraceful behaviour of parliamentarians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Congratulations Gordon! You've just alienated a million voters. I thought the Speaker was the most arrogant and ignorant Scots parliamentarian but you've totally eclipsed his efforts

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
